name: Study Guide
description: Study Guide is the application that can make you improve your studies, having at your fingertips all the features you need in your daily life:  Courses management You can store different courses with corresponding data (subjects, teachers, etc).  Subjects management You can also keep your subjects, manage their topics and access to the repository where you can attach your notes, photos, etc. to the topics.  Planning You can keep your schedule and exams.  Alarm The application has a configurable alarm that will alert you to deliver upcoming exams or assignments.  Study techniques With the study techniques you will learn to plan better your schedule and your performance in the study to pass the exams.  If you want to improve your version acquires Study Guide Pro which you can insert your tasks without ads. Plus you get access to your schedule using two different widget and your tasks with another widget.  If you find any error send an email to the developer mailing, if possible, android version of the device and description of the error, we will fix it as soon as possible.
